T02TD2597E:50a-1: a'a rya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangig'a ti tsa kra kra ma:/
T02TD2597E:50a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa /
T02TD2597E:50a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2597E:50a-5: thog med dus mtha' nam mkha' bsod nams dpag med pa //
T02TD2597E:50b-0: mkha' @50b mnyam sems can sgrol phyir thams cad mkhyen bsngos pa'i //
T02TD2597E:50b-1: 'jam dbyangs mtshan ldan dus gsum bde gshegs dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa'i tshul //
T02TD2597E:50b-2: kun du [*kun tu?] gzigs par lung ba stan bsam gyis mi khyab de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2597E:50b-3: bla ma dam pa'i gzhung lugs las //
T02TD2597E:50b-4: man ngag rgyas par rab ba stan pa //
T02TD2597E:50b-5: snyigs ma'i sems can blo zhan rnams //
T02TD2597E:50b-6: rnam rtog g-yeng bas mos pa nyung //
T02TD2597E:50b-7: de la dran phyir bsdus pa 'di //
T02TD2597E:50b-8: grub dang lung ba stan ma thob kyang //
T02TD2597E:50b-9: sman pa phan par zhugs pa bzhin //
T02TD2597E:50b-10: bdag gis 'di ni byas pa yin ;
T02TD2597E:50b-11: / dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis //
T02TD2597E:50b-12: yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu //
T02TD2597E:50b-14: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2597E:50b-15: yi ge aa ni rnam bsams nas //
T02TD2597E:50b-16: de yi 'od kyis bla ma dang //
T02TD2597E:50b-17: bde gshegs sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2597E:50b-18: mdun du mngon sum lta bur dmigs //
T02TD2597E:50b-19: lus ngag yid kyis yang dag par //
T02TD2597E:50b-20: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2597E:50b-21: rgya chen 'dod pa thams cad gyis //
T02TD2597E:50b-22: sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bgyid //
T02TD2597E:50b-23: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun la //
T02TD2597E:50b-24: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02TD2597E:50b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed pa'i //
T02TD2597E:50b-26: dge ba kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2597E:50b-27: mngon sangs rgyas nas mi ring ba'i //
T02TD2597E:50b-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2597E:50b-29: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni //
T02TD2597E:50b-30: bskor phyir bdag gis bskul bar 'tshal //
T02TD2597E:50b-31: yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa //
T02TD2597E:50b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
T02TD2597E:50b-33: bskal pa rab mang bzhugs par ni //
T02TD2597E:50b-34: sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba 'de bas //
T02TD2597E:50b-35: gang yang bdag gi mchod pa rnam drug dang //
T02TD2597E:50b-36: dge ba bzhin byas de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD2597E:50b-37: bla med rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob phyir //
T02TD2597E:50b-38: bdag gis chos bzhin yongs su bgyi //
T02TD2597E:50b-39: chos la dbang bskur sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02TD2597E:50b-40: byang chub snying po'i bar du skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2597E:50b-41: ae ma sems can bla med bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD2597E:50b-42: bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur cig / bdag nyid dngos po 'bul lags kyis //
T02TD2597E:51a-2: ji ltar bzhed pa mdzad pa'i phyir //
T02TD2597E:51a-3: bdag lus so sor bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2597E:51a-4: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2597E:51a-5: khyad 'phags lam ni bdag gis ba sten //
T02TD2597E:51a-6: de nas ye shes rnam lnga yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-7: gzugs brnyan tsam la rab dmigs la //
T02TD2597E:51a-8: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam dag pa //
T02TD2597E:51a-9: rang bzhin gyis ni byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2597E:51a-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2597E:51a-11: nam mkha' lta bur rab dmigs la //
T02TD2597E:51a-12: yi ge bhr'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-13: stong gsum tshad dang mnyam pa yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-14: mchod rten bde gshegs gzhal yas ni //
T02TD2597E:51a-15: rim pa drug dang ldan par bsgom //
T02TD2597E:51a-16: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs par bsam //
T02TD2597E:51a-17: dbus kyi snying po'i pho brang du //
T02TD2597E:51a-18: dbus su seng ge'i gdan nyid de //
T02TD2597E:51a-19: gzhan yang rim pa ji bzhin bsam //
T02TD2597E:51a-20: de yi dbus ma'i gdan thog tu //
T02TD2597E:51a-21: aa las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ;
T02TD2597E:51a-22: / mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
T02TD2597E:51a-23: zhi ba rgyan spangs byang chub mchog / kun du [*kun tu?] zhal gyis rnam par mdzes //
T02TD2597E:51a-24: de thugs dh'i: las bskyed pa yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-25: gdong lnga zur phud lnga pa me tog thod //
T02TD2597E:51a-26: g-yas pa bzhin ral gri ste //
T02TD2597E:51a-27: g-yon bzhi shes rab pu sti bsnams //
T02TD2597E:51a-28: rgyan dang na bza' gzhon nu'i tshul //
T02TD2597E:51a-29: thugs kar aa las byung ba yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-30: 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan //
T02TD2597E:51a-31: ji ltar gsang sngags dgod pa ni //
T02TD2597E:51a-32: 'khor lo'i cho ga mthong ba yis //
T02TD2597E:51a-33: dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kar bsam //
T02TD2597E:51a-34: lte bar aa las byung ba yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-35: ye shes sems dpa' zhal drug pa //
T02TD2597E:51a-36: autpala dmar dang sngon po ni //
T02TD2597E:51a-37: po tis mtshan pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2597E:51a-38: gzhon nu'i rgyan ldan thugs kar ni //
T02TD2597E:51a-39: zla ba'i steng du aa dkar bsam //
T02TD2597E:51a-40: de las so sor 'phros pa yis //
T02TD2597E:51a-41: rim bzhin thams cad snang byas nas //
T02TD2597E:51a-42: nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam sems can gyi //
T02TD2597E:51a-43: ma rig mun ba bsal byas nas //
T02TD2597E:51a-44: slar 'dus rim bzhin rang nyid kyi //
T02TD2597E:51a-45: yi ge'i nang du 'dus par blta //
T02TD2597E:51a-46: de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2597E:51a-47: mtshan brjod rim par bklag pa yang //
T02TD2597E:51b-0: zhes pa dang po nas brtsams @51b nas ;
T02TD2597E:51b-1: / don chen yi ge dam pa'i bar //
T02TD2597E:51b-2: rang gis de nyid brjod pa yin //
T02TD2597E:51b-3: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02TD2597E:51b-4: tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02TD2597E:51b-5: de mthar thug pa yum bzhi yin //
T02TD2597E:51b-6: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02TD2597E:51b-7: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:51b-8: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02TD2597E:51b-9: de dag mthar ni rigs lnga ste //
T02TD2597E:51b-10: bde gshegs yab dang yum rnams kyang //
T02TD2597E:51b-11: mtshan gyi don la rab dmigs te //
T02TD2597E:51b-12: mnyam par bzhag nas mtshan brjod ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-13: rim bzhin klog pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD2597E:51b-14: rang gi de nyid yi ge las //
T02TD2597E:51b-15: rim bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba yis ;
T02TD2597E:51b-16: / rang rang gdan la dgod par bya //
T02TD2597E:51b-17: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02TD2597E:51b-18: zhes pa dang por brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-20: de yi mthar thug sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-21: bcu drug 'khor lo rab tu dgod //
T02TD2597E:51b-22: yi ge aa las bskyed pa dang //
T02TD2597E:51b-23: sems can don byas slar 'dus te //
T02TD2597E:51b-24: rang gi gdan la dgod par byas //
T02TD2597E:51b-25: spyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste //
T02TD2597E:51b-26: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:51b-27: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i bar //
T02TD2597E:51b-28: phyi nang lha mo bskyed par bya //
T02TD2597E:51b-29: byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med //
T02TD2597E:51b-30: de bzhin theg chen tshul gnas par //
T02TD2597E:51b-31: yi ge aa las bskyed pa yi //
T02TD2597E:51b-32: bskal bzang phyi rol rim bzhin du //
T02TD2597E:51b-33: 'khor lo gsum la dgod par bya //
T02TD2597E:51b-34: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-35: ji srid bsgoms pa'i mthar thug pa //
T02TD2597E:51b-36: tshigs bcad bcu bzhi dag gis ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-37: mtshan gyi don rnams ba stan pa yin //
T02TD2597E:51b-39: gzugs su gyur nas lhar gnas pa //
T02TD2597E:51b-40: pho brang snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD2597E:51b-41: rim gnyis chos dbyings ye shes kyi //
T02TD2597E:51b-42: dkyil 'khor dgod pa ba stan par byas //
T02TD2597E:51b-43: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD2597E:51b-44: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:51b-45: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02TD2597E:51b-46: mthar thug aom gyi rnam par spro //
T02TD2597E:51b-47: gti mug spyod pa dag byas te //
T02TD2597E:51b-48: slar 'dus rim pa gnyis pa las //
T02TD2597E:51b-49: rnam par snang mdzad tshul gyis ni //
T02TD2597E:51b-50: mtshan gyi don rnams grangs bzhin du //
T02TD2597E:51b-51: phyogs bzhi dag nas bzhugs pa yin //
T02TD2597E:52a-0: tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lnga @52a * //
T02TD2597E:52a-2: / tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba //
T02TD2597E:52a-3: 'di yi don la dmigs shing dgod //
T02TD2597E:52a-4: de nas rim pa gsum pa ru //
T02TD2597E:52a-5: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
T02TD2597E:52a-6: tshul nas rab tu bstod pa ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-8: ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-9: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog / ces pa yi ni mthar thug par //
T02TD2597E:52a-10: h'um gi rnam par spro zhing bsdu //
T02TD2597E:52a-11: mi bskyod pa yi rnam par dgod //
T02TD2597E:52a-12: tshig rkang gcig gis lhag pa yi //
T02TD2597E:52a-13: tshigs bcad bcu yis phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD2597E:52a-14: gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa gcig spros //
T02TD2597E:52a-15: zhe sdang btul nas rnam par gnas //
T02TD2597E:52a-16: de nas rim pa bzhi pa ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-17: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02TD2597E:52a-18: ces pa dang por brtsams nas ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-20: de mthar thug pa spro bsdu ste //
T02TD2597E:52a-21: snang ba mtha' yas rnam pa yis //
T02TD2597E:52a-22: phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam par gnas ;
T02TD2597E:52a-23: / so sor kun rtog ye shes ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-24: hr'i: yi rnam par spro bsdu ste //
T02TD2597E:52a-25: 'dod chags rnam par dag byas la //
T02TD2597E:52a-26: tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi //
T02TD2597E:52a-27: mtshan don gzhung las byung ba bzhin //
T02TD2597E:52a-28: phyogs bzhi rnam par bgos pa'o //
T02TD2597E:52a-29: de nas rim pa lnga pa yi //
T02TD2597E:52a-30: dkyil 'khor bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD2597E:52a-31: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
T02TD2597E:52a-32: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52a-33: nor bu chen po rin chen tog / de mthar thug pa mnyam nyid kyi //
T02TD2597E:52a-34: ye shes tshigs bcad nyi shu gnyis //
T02TD2597E:52a-36: ser sna can ni rnam bcom zhing //
T02TD2597E:52a-37: mtshan gyi don ni grangs bzhin du //
T02TD2597E:52a-38: rin chen 'byung ldan tshul du gnas //
T02TD2597E:52a-40: de nas rim pa drug pa'o //
T02TD2597E:52a-41: don grub dkyil 'khor dgod pa yang //
T02TD2597E:52a-42: tshigs bcad bco lnga'i mtshan don ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-43: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba //
T02TD2597E:52a-44: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52a-45: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog / de yi mthar thug mtshan rnams ni //
T02TD2597E:52a-46: aa yi rnam par spo zhing bsdu //
T02TD2597E:52a-47: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi //
T02TD2597E:52a-48: 'gro ba phrag dog rnam sbyangs te //
T02TD2597E:52b-0: don grub rnam @52b par rim bzhin dgod //
T02TD2597E:52b-1: de lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis //
T02TD2597E:52b-2: 'od zer spro zhing bsdus nas su //
T02TD2597E:52b-3: khams gsum sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD2597E:52b-4: gang gi 'od zer reg gyur pa //
T02TD2597E:52b-5: de yi sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD2597E:52b-6: sangs rgyas kun la reg 'gyur zhing //
T02TD2597E:52b-7: bsdu zhing bdag dang mnyam par spyar //
T02TD2597E:52b-8: dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang //
T02TD2597E:52b-9: mdog dang gdan dang phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2597E:52b-10: de bzhin dang po'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD2597E:52b-11: 'khor lo la sogs rim pa yang //
T02TD2597E:52b-12: ji ltar grags pa bzhin du dgod //
T02TD2597E:52b-13: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: yis //
T02TD2597E:52b-14: ye shes 'khor lo rnams bkug cing //
T02TD2597E:52b-15: bdag dang mnyam par spyar byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52b-16: rang bzhin mchod pa'i sprin tshogs bstims //
T02TD2597E:52b-17: bsdus pa'i sgo nas bstod pa yang //
T02TD2597E:52b-18: mchog spyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02TD2597E:52b-19: ces pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52b-20: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02TD2597E:52b-21: ces pa'i tshigs bcad bzhi bzhi yis //
T02TD2597E:52b-22: dkyil 'khor lnga la bsdus te bstod //
T02TD2597E:52b-23: de nas mtshan gyi yon tan ni //
T02TD2597E:52b-24: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2597E:52b-25: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52b-26: chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes pa //
T02TD2597E:52b-27: yon tan sgo nas bstod pa yin //
T02TD2597E:52b-28: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2597E:52b-29: zhes pa lnga yis rnam phye la //
T02TD2597E:52b-30: dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan ni //
T02TD2597E:52b-31: rim pa bzhin du mkhas pas dbye //
T02TD2597E:52b-32: de yis tshigs bcad mtshan rnams ni //
T02TD2597E:52b-33: dkyil 'khor lnga yi yon tan grags //
T02TD2597E:52b-34: aom sarba dharm'a zhes pa nas //
T02TD2597E:52b-35: dzny'a na garbha a'a: yi bar //
T02TD2597E:52b-36: sku yi phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD2597E:52b-37: de la brtan zhing rab gnas par //
T02TD2597E:52b-38: sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin //
T02TD2597E:52b-39: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD2597E:52b-40: zhes pa dang por brtsams byas nas //
T02TD2597E:52b-41: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
T02TD2597E:52b-42: de yi mthar thug bsdus pa yi //
T02TD2597E:52b-43: sgo nas yang dag ston pa yin //
T02TD2597E:52b-44: de ltar gang zhig sgom byed cing //
T02TD2597E:52b-46: rnam gsum don la dmigs pa yis //
T02TD2597E:52b-47: ring por me thogs 'dul dbang gis //
T02TD2597E:52b-48: yon tan gzhung sogs thams cad kyang //
T02TD2597E:52b-49: ma lus de yis thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2597E:52b-50: sa mchog bcu gnyis rab bgrod nas //
T02TD2597E:53a-2: thun bzhi'am ni thun gsum gyis //
T02TD2597E:53a-3: mtshan ma brtan po byung gi bar //
T02TD2597E:53a-4: de ni rgyun du bklag par bya //
T02TD2597E:53a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dang //
T02TD2597E:53a-6: zhi sogs las rnams bsam par bya //
T02TD2597E:53a-7: gzhan yang shi la phan pa dang //
T02TD2597E:53a-8: cho ga'i bye brag ma lus kun //
T02TD2597E:53a-9: cho ga chen por mthong bar bya //
T02TD2597E:53a-10: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i rim pa yang //
T02TD2597E:53a-11: rim bzhin yi ge aa las te //
T02TD2597E:53a-12: de nas thig le dmigs pa med //
T02TD2597E:53a-13: sgyu ma'i tshul du spyod lam brtag / dam pa'i gzhung lugs gsal mod kyi //
T02TD2597E:53a-14: bsdus la dga' ba'i dor byas nas ;
T02TD2597E:53a-16: khab len dbang gis lcags bsdu bzhin //
T02TD2597E:53a-17: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la mos pa yin //
T02TD2597E:53a-18: rang dbang med par rtsom pa la //
T02TD2597E:53a-19: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2597E:53a-20: de las bdag gis dge ba gang thob des //
T02TD2597E:53a-21: 'gro ba rnams kyi don rtogs zhi gyur nas //
T02TD2597E:53a-22: bdag sogs 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra gyur te //
T02TD2597E:53a-23: nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam sems can grol bar shog /'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa /
T02TD2597E:53a-24: bla ma dam pa'i cho ga chen po'i gzhung rnams las //
T02TD2597E:53a-25: blo zhan pa'i don du mos pa tsam las 'jug pa 'di dag gi rim pa phra mo rdzogs so //
